title: Publish wall time together with sim time

content.raw:
drcsim should publish a message that include simulation time and wallclock time.  We obviously can't modify the ROS /clock message format.  So we should add a new message of some sort, or perhaps just add wall clock time to to the new in-progress message that has the whole robot state?

For justification, see: https://www.theroboticschallenge.org/forum/default.aspx?Function_fst=ViewThread&ThreadID_fin=121
